docs.abstract: New York Knicks coach Mike Woodson plays down critical remarks from player Tyson Chandler following team's blowout loss to the Brooklyn Nets; Chandler had criticized his team's insistence on defensive switching.

headline.main: As Losses Mount, Knicks Play Down Pointed Remarks

docs.snippet: The Knicks have aggressively and unabashedly developed a well-oiled system of cultivating and cosseting celebrity fans at Madison Square Garden....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Knicks have aggressively and unabashedly developed a well-oiled system of cultivating and cosseting celebrity fans at Madison Square Garden.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks have aggressively and unabashedly developed well-oiled system of cultivating and cosseting big-name fans at Madison Square Garden, seating A-level celebrities at six prime courtside seats; in exchange, stars are often asked to be filmed during games or appear in team's promotional and recruitment videos.

headline.main: Knicks Have a Star Magnet: Courtside Seats
